Ok, here is what I did to use multiplayer with this

"you need tunngle,1.6 & 1.6-1.7 patch
install .6 then .7 patches"

...and once you do that you need to overwrite the "iw3sp.exe" with the cracked file again. File size should be 2947 KB.

It does work in multiplayer mode doing this.
